about.title: PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
about.body:
Project Manager and Program Manager with over 15 years of experience leading ICT and cloud transformation programs on a global scale, with a focus on digital transformation, enterprise scalability, and application modernization. Specialized in the end-to-end governance of complex programs across multi-cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI), combining leadership, strategic planning, budget control, and coordination of global stakeholders and vendors.

I have led major initiatives for enterprise clients such as British Telecom, Fastweb, Poste Italiane, Swisscom, SoftBank, Altice USA, and InfoCert, ensuring time-to-market, delivery quality, risk management, and operational continuity for mission-critical platforms.

Strong experience in the technical leadership of Professional Services teams and close collaboration with Engineering to align business requirements, software architecture, security, technical delivery, and product roadmap.

AI enthusiast: experimentation and adoption of Generative AI solutions to enhance productivity, automation, knowledge management, and decision-making in delivery processes. Skilled in prompt engineering, RAG architectures, and enterprise AI application.

Collaborative and innovation-driven approach, with focus on KPI/OKR-based execution and operational excellence enabled by Agile and DevOps methodologies. Proficient in tools such as Jira, Tempo Timesheets, Confluence, MS Project, Bamboo, Git, and Jenkins.

competencies.list:
Leadership & Delivery: Technical leadership, Agile team management, stakeholder engagement, mentoring, blocker removal, performance management.

Software Development: Java (Full Stack), Node.js, React, HTML/CSS/JS, microservices, REST API.

Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Docker, virtualization, containers, CI/CD (Jira, Bamboo, Git, Jenkins), monitoring & performance testing.

Architecture & Security: Scalable and secure architectures, SSO, MFA, PKI, GDPR compliance, encryption (AES, 3DES).

Testing & Quality: TDD, unit/integration testing, QA best practices, continuous quality monitoring.

Client Management: Direct customer engagement, pre-sales, technical demos (POC), solution customization, long-term account development, alignment between client needs and technical execution.

Product Strategy: Reusable and market-ready solutions, product innovation, go-to-market support, alignment between business vision and technical execution.

AI & Emerging Technologies: Generative AI, prompt engineering, RAG architectures, foundational Web3 & Blockchain knowledge, ethical AI adoption.
